title: Nedryland
description: Nedryland is my collection of dotfiles used to provision new computers and synchronize command line interface preferences. This ensures consistency across my computers with the same set of Zsh (Z Shell), Starship, and Oh My Zsh customizations. Nedryland includes time-saving Git workflow improvements such as automatically attaching ticket numbers to commits, generating and zipping patches, and conditionally opening the Git editor in the most foreground IDE. Additionally, it supports generating and automatically purging temporary directories.
